mapper.update: update user set nickname=#{nickname} where email=#{email}
mapper.delete: delete from user where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
mapper.select: select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, num, board_code, subject, readcount, nickname from ( select free_board_num as num, board_code, subject, readcount, insert_date, nickname from free_board union all select tip_board_num as num, board_code, subject, readcount, insert_date, nickname from tip_board ) a, (select @rownum :=0) b where nickname = #{nickname} order by insert_date desc limit 10

select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, find_board_num as num, pet_name, detail_address, insert_date, readcount, email, bookmark_count from find_board, (select @rownum :=0) b where email = #{email} order by insert_date desc limit 10
mapper.update: update user set password=#{password2} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select f.*, ff.upload fileuploadpath from find_board f join find_board_file ff on f.find_board_num = ff.find_board_num where f.find_board_num in ( select find_board_num from bookmark where email=#{email});
